rooms.title: Preface
rooms.prompt: You are alone in a dark room. Suddenly, a light flash occurs outside and your immediate vicinity is illuminated. On the floor is a gun.
choices: Turn and Run out the Door.

rooms.title: Grab the Gun and Run
choices: Turn and Run out the Door.

rooms.title: Turn and run out the Door
rooms.prompt: You scared bitch. you ran away without a gun. zombies are all around you. what do you do?
choices: Turn and Run out the Door.
